Title: Home to Roost
Writer: Aaron Korsh (created by), Sandra Silverstein, Sharyn Rothstein (executive story editor), Sandra Silverstein (executive story editor)
Actors: Gabriel Macht, Patrick J. Adams, Rick Hoffman, Meghan Markle
Plot: Mike deals with the blow back on his prison case; Harvey tries to tell Donna about his relationship with Paula. Louis past behavior comes back to haunt him.
